channel.title: [REF] Client input

item.title: [REF] Client input
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

How would I make the client input show up on a line from RSInterface.java if that makes any sense. For example, you click a button and you type something and press enter, how would I make it so that whatever you type, goes on the line. So far Iâ€™ve done this:

	addHoverButton(10528, "Interfaces/clanCreation/SPRITE", 2, 200, 27, "Clan Name", [b]1845[/b], 10529, 1);
	addHoveredButton(10529, "Interfaces/clanCreation/SPRITE", 3, 200, 27, 10530);



	if([b]j == 1845[/b]) { //clan name
		inputTaken = true;
		messagePromptRaised = true;
		amountOrNameInput = "";
		inputDialogState = 0;
		interfaceButtonAction = 504;
		aString1121 = "Enter clan name";
	}



			if(interfaceButtonAction == 504 && promptInput.length() > 0) {
				//I don't know what to put here
				sendPacket(103);
			}
